description:
" Viktor continues his research on HexTech magic to find a cure. Heimerdinger is aware of the potential risks and tries to control this power !!!"


You are invited to this talk where tech meets sparkling creativity, presented by two characters from the Netflix show Arcane : Viktor and Heimerdinger in Cosplay !


Cosplay combines artistic and craft skills for costumes making, but with electronic and IT infrastructure it becomes next level !!!


After a brief introduction to Cosplay, we will explain in details the building of the costumes and props on stage and you will be able to interact with us with commonly used IT tools.

Come to learn in a funny way !
title: Cosplay and tech : the great adventure ðŸš€
